name: Eventjoy
long_description: Eventjoy is a mobile-first ticketing company that is redefining how people organize and experience events. Organizers all around the world use Eventjoy to plan everything from conferences to happy hours. They're building technology to make event organizing a breeze, with a focus on mobile to enhance the event day experience.

name: Livement
long_description: Livement (Boletomóvil in Latin America) transforms event ticketing with effortless and secure transactions. Our solution relies on controlling both the primary and secondary market, putting an end to ticket fraud and scalping. We empower event organizers with exclusive control over the secondary market, preventing ticket reselling on other web platforms. This prioritizes genuine fans and ensures fair revenue sharing among stakeholders.
one_liner: Livement makes selling tickets for events easy and safe for organizers

name: CrowdVolt
long_description:
CrowdVolt is a two-sided, bid-ask style live event marketplace similar to StockX. We’ve created the only secondary ticket exchange that supports fully automated order fulfillment.

Contact us at founders@crowdvolt.com
one_liner: Bid/ask style ticket exchange powered by automated order fulfillment

name: Ticket Wallet
long_description:
Ticket Wallet is an AI-powered resale platform for season ticket holders and brokers.
We automate pricing, listing, and distribution across all major marketplaces.

Today, most tickets are still sold manually: spreadsheets, guessing prices, and listing on one site at a time. The biggest brokers outsource pricing to teams in the Philippines… 

We built Ticket Wallet because we lived this. Truman has been flipping tickets for the last 5 years. Ryan built pricing software after seeing the mess first-hand. We’ve turned that pain into a product.

Since launch, we’ve onboarded $3M+ in ticket inventory, signed up 100+ paying sellers, and started working with pro teams. We charge 10% per ticket sold. This is our wedge into the $26B resale market.

Other platforms cost you money. We make you more of it.
